mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.course_id AS "courseId", a.attach_name AS "attachName", a.attach_id AS "attachId", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
LEFT JOIN course_catelog cct ON cct.id = a.course_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO course_catelog( id, course_id, attach_name, attach_id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{courseId}, #{attachName}, #{attachId}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
